articles.author: Paul Dallison, Douglas Busvine
articles.title: Putin has strange deep voice in address to BRICS summit - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Russian leader tells other leaders about grain deal plans — but not in his own voice.
articles.content:
Vladimir Putin addressed a summit of the BRICS countries on Tuesday  but not in his normal voice.
The Kremlin leader didn't attend the gathering of leaders from Brazil, Russia, India, China and Sout… [+1164 chars]
